creditline: Given in memory of the artist's parents Alma and Merril Grubbs; courtesy of Koplin Del Rio
description: black and white image of elderly man lying in hospital bed in a darkened room with oxygen mask over mouth; man's head is turned toward viewer at PL; smock is pulled away at shoulder; dark empty chair at R; hospital equipment just visible in shadows
inscription: on back: Dad/Bed / Tim Lowly © 2001 / Acrylic on panel / 9\" x 12\"
title: Dad/Bed
